Cell.Data: Based on "Nachum Dershowitz, Edward M. Reingold--- Calendarical Calculation. 3rd ed,Cambridge 2008".

ss:Data.Font: Input cell to check if it's leap year.
Out put cell, leap year=1, otherwise=0.

B.Font: since Janurary and February are treated as month 13 and 14, then year=year-1

ss:Data.Font: According to Zeller's congruence, month from 3-14, Janurary=13, February=14
